name: Renea Obryan
text: Great Company to work with. Our service Representative Derek is so nice and helpful, an asset to the Company. Great experience all around from Sales to Service. We love our rugs!!

name: Jr 5 Mcmillian
text: Thomas Truck Lines, Inc. experience over the years with UniFirst and more especially their representative, Danny, that comes by every week to service our office and shop has been as good as it gets.  Danny is an asset to UniFirst in the highest degree.  He is always upbeat and pleasant.  He is professional and is willing to take the time to answer any questions that we might have.  Highly recommend UniFirst and Danny to any one thinking of using a uniform service.

name: Renea Green
text: Williams Paint And Body Shop from Marianna, Fl here! We LOVE Derek Watkins! He is always in a good mood and upbeat. When we have questions or concerns he is on top of it getting it handled, no problem. 10/10 best there is! He is a great asset to UniFirst Uniform Services.

name: Whitewater Environmental
text: Absolutely the best customer service representative (Derek) on our route! He makes sure we have everything we need and communicates all schedule changes in advance. Loves that he brings In the catalogs for opportunities to buy merchandise too.

name: Sharon Lampley
text: I work here , started yesterday. Love It 💕

name: Dajun Godwin
text: My name is Dajun Godwin and I am one of the Route Service Managers here at UniFirst in Dothan, Al. It has been a pleasure to work with this company for the past nine years and I look forward to many more! UniFirst, not only in Dothan, but company wide, is a generous company who not only looks after their customers, but their employees needs and desires. UniFirst is a great company to work for with great benefits and provides so many with the opportunities for growth within the company. I would recommend UniFirst as not just a company that will give you a great job, but a company you can grow in and build a career in!

name: Lillie Gilbert
text: This is Jackson county road and bridge Derek is so awesome I love working with him, he is a super nice guy. I appreciate how he communicate with me about the uniform's. It's always good to see him on Thursday ☺️

name: Cathy Daughtry
text:
Chris is always so helpful and eager to help us anyway he can. Always comes in with a smile.
Thanks for keeping our guys uniform ready.  We appreciate all you do for us,  Chris.    ~Cathy, with ADS Security- Dothan, Al.~

name: Londa Rambeau
text: Mr. Danny always does an AMAZING job! Everyone here at (Georgia Gulf Sulfur) really appreciate his time and effort. Thank you!

name: Myra Johnson
text: Derek Watkins is always very friendly, courteous & helpful. He always helps with whatever we need and always has a smile on his face.  Great customer service representative for your company.

name: Donta Wade
text: Mr. Danny is amazing! Always on time and great customer service! will recommend him and UniFirst to anyone. Signed THE TOWN OF GORDON, ALABAMA.

text: I am an employee of XPO Logistics and Michael Lingo is our route driver.   He is always so helpful, courteous and pleasant.  He always goes about his work with a smile on his face.   He is a wonderful representation of your company and you should be proud to have him as an employee!

name: Quetta Johnson
text: Derek comes to Cobbs and he is a great guy very respectable! Does his job well! Always asking what he can do to help more or make things better!

Samson Steel Truss.

name: Jim Ed Brown
text: I'm employed with Covington Cleaner & Equipment (DIVISION OF CHDP) in Andalusia, Al. We've only been open since Oct 2015. Once we first started getting our uniforms from UniFirst, I have to say, I have ZERO complaints with our service. We've had several changes that we asked in our initial fitting, from the pants size, to the shirts, and the style each person felt comfortable in. And each time a request was made, the next delivery (each week), our request was fulfilled, and with a smile on top of that.  If there's a business out there that has been searching for a great  uniform service, then look no further. THIS IS IT!!!

name: Antonio Caceres
text: jamie, our delivery guy here to our MAACO of Dothan location is by far, one of the most professional, hard working and honest individuals i have come across in the rental uniform field. Always on time, courteous and polite to all of our needs in the front office with our mats and our uniforms. Wished we had 4 of him working for us here!

name: Bonnie HCG
text: I am with the Henry Co Gin and Dajun is our UniFirst rep and he does an excellent job.  He is always cheerful and willing to hear any problems or concerns we may have, which is usually none or very small, and handles them immediately.   The workers know they can ask him questions about purchasing pants, shirts or jackets for themselves and he is very helpful in answering all their questions.  We are extremely pleased with the service we receive from UniFirst and Dajun.

name: Spenser Peters
text:
I own Spensers meat market in Dothan
Unifirst has provided me with great product and wonderful customer service over the years!
The drivers are very pleasant to deal with also!
I'd highly recommend them to anyone looking for services!

name: Jamie Croft
text: I work with Opp's Co-op in Opp, AL.  UniFirst of Dothan, AL provides us with great service.  Dejun is the best! He always makes sure we are pleased with the service and does what ever he can for us. Highly recommend UniFirst of Dothan!

name: Christi Peterson
text:
I am the owner of Ray's Restaurant. I would like to say that our delivery driver, Jamie is the best! And for him I give him 5 stars. He always makes sure that we have what we need and goes above and beyond to make sure that we get it. Thanks Jamie!

The reason that I am giving Uni1st an overall 3  stars is because we often have problems withour towels being full of lint. They also come torn or very worn also. We sometimes do not get a full bag, shorting us before our next delivery.  Our aprons that we receive often have half of the tie torn off. So we can't even tie them on. Also, they come very stained occasionally as if they have been mildewed and then laundered. The mildew stain is still there after the wash. We pay a fee each week for these items to be replaced as needed, but we rarely see new items in the
mix. We have also had problems with the posting of payments in a timely manner. Because the payments are not posted we then get a late charge added to the bill. It would be great if these small issues could get taken care of.

name: Tiffany Blackmon
text: The Dothan Housing Authority -Henry Green Central Office really enjoys the service that we receive from Uni First our delivery man: "Dajun" is very courteous, reliable, and efficient. GREAT JOB !!!

name: Alex Ethridge
text:
We are so pleased with our service from UniFirst here at Keystone Automotive! Having a clean environment is important to us when running a business and UniFirst gives us the resources to do so. Our friendly driver, Dajun Godwin, always shows up with our clean floor mats and soap with a smile on his face! He does everything for us! We couldn't be happier with this company!

Alex Ethridge
Dothan, Al.
Accountant

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We’ve been a customer for a few months now, we had a mechanic lose everything he owned and uniform he had in a tornado on 3/25. I called Morgan on Friday 3/26 to let her know what happened. On Monday 4/5 an ENTIRE set of new uniforms were delivered. We cannot express our gratitude enough for these wonderful people.

name: Brandon Parsons
text: Great service, great people, always making sure things are done correctly. Strongly suggest any company looking for a uniform supplier to give them a shot. Or anyone who is not satisfied with their current provider. These guys are the best at what they do.

text: Love our UniFirst service here in Anniston!  Our route guy is Matt Hendrix and he always makes sure he takes care of our employees uniforms and our supply needs.  I've worked with other uniform services in the past and can honestly say UniFirst has been by far the best service I've encountered.  Highly recommend!

name: John Schafer
text: Great service. We swapped from another company who will remain nameless. Got way better prices and the customer service is by far better.

name: Heather Caldwell

text: We work in Tuscaloosa, and Chris is our "guy". He is amazing. I know he will be here every Tuesday morning bright and early, always with a smile on his face. I really dont think I have ever seen him in an ill mood. Great Job Chris!!!!!!!

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We have tried every uniform company available to us in our area, we switched to Unifirst several months ago and have been nothing less than pleased! The customer service is 10/5 stars. They even made my three year old son a custom uniform to match the "big guys" here at work. If you have a question or concern you get to talk to YOUR team of Unifirst Reps and they personally make sure you are taken care of and satisfied with their service.

text: UniFirst does an amazing job.  Justin is our guy with UniFirst and he gives us the best, quick but efficient service EVER.  I speak for our company when I say, we couldn't ask for better.

name: Beverly VanOrden
text: Sent in weeks worth of uniforms and now my other week an my husband and son only have one a piece.. So not a happy camper right now having to wash every night one set an the every morning the other cause one works days and other works nights for same company..

resp.text: Our apologies and thanks for bringing this to our attention. UniFirst has built its positive reputation by delivering excellence in customer service, and it appears one of our Locations may have fallen short of our expectations. Please call our centralized customer service team at (800) 794-2706, so we can open an official Service Request. This closed-loop, computerized system features an automated tracking and resolution process, so issues never fall through the cracks. We record all concerns for follow up within 24 hours, assign clear accountability for actions, maintain a history of requests and actions taken, and close the request only after your satisfaction is confirmed. We appreciate your business and never take it for granted. Thanks for your patience while we work to fix this.

name: Eat Sleep Disc. Com
text: We get our Logo Polo Shirts & Hats from Unifirst.  Great quality & price.  Would definitely buy from them again!

name: Allyson Hann
text: I work for Icemakers, Inc.  Deal with Justin every Monday and he is a very top notch employee.  Unifirst always has great customer service and their products are very well taken care of.  If we ever have an issue it is handled promptly.

name: Connie Lawson
text: Derrick does an awesome job taking care of all our uniform needs. Very pleased with the service!

name: Diane Clark
text: Scott does an outstanding job handling our uniform needs.

name: Pam Bullock
text: Justin Sargent is our delivery person at Evoqua Water Technologies in Irondale AL. He is courteous, well mannered, and all around nice person. We have no complaints on the uniform service as of yet.

name: Steve Simmons
text:
I was not looking to change Uniform company's, when the President of our company asked me to review prices and services.
After meeting with Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope from Unifirst, it was obvious I needed to make a change. I was able to save the company a considerable amount of money with increased services.
Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope with Unifirst were always available with answers and made changing company's a smooth transition.

name: Steven Hughes
text: UniFirst has an amazing maintenance manager.

name: Rodney Dennis
text: Justin does a great at Clark memorials.

name: Joe Driver
text: I've been having a problem with my uniforms not fitting correctly ... All of them all the same size but do not all fit the same I've made one phone call and they came right out re-measured me and he getting me all new uniforms ... If you're looking for uniform company try try UniFirst before you spend time and money getting disappointed by the other companies

name: Derrick Marrisett
text: Great people Great place to work

name: Monica Bowman
text: Worked there for over 2 years. Went in as a temp then got hired on. Also many friendly people who are willing to help. MS. Sherry trained me when I startedthen MS. Chris trained me on other stuff. Really felt like family. The only reason I left was to help my dad take care of my step mom who passed a week after we got here. Would recommend this place highly.

name: Amber Luckner
text: The management was very friendly and open. Details of the facility and job extremely clear. What impressed me the most was that it is not afraid to believe in GOD or show God like quality's.

name: Micki Streitmatter
text: I went to apply for a job the man who interviewed me was extremely nice it really seems to be a wonderful place to work

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Micki!

name: Peter Hager
text: They do not answer the phone

name: Paige Allen
text:
I'm a new employee of kapplar
I've never seen more patient people training me here from management to employees outstanding performance here
I wish I knew of this company 35 years ago I'd came here then I love it here.from team support Jessica
To supervisor heather & chris outstanding
Performance .
Hr Mrs.King is also amazing  she does a excellent job n human resources
Plant manager Paul is the best ever as busy is his schedule is when u need him he is there I special thank him and kapplar for allowing Daniel  Spencer n his group to.
Come n and customize my machines I use
Also a special ty to Coleman and avery maintenance her is the best on top of everything.
I like the convenience of the restrooms lunch room vending all conveniently  located up front
This is just a awesome place to work.a 2nd family here.Ty,

Freeman P.Allen

resp.text: Thanks so much, Paige. We are glad you've had a positive experience!

name: Alissandra Gabriel
text: Good job

name: Tracy Cheek
text: Top notch facility.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Tracy! We appreciate it.

name: Kenny Wilson
text: Good place and friendly
